review: This device is very easy to use; the remote was easy to figure out although I have not tried the voice commands yet. The video and audio quality are amazing and the setup was extremely easy. I watched it for a month before ever looking at the online video instructions. I'm a bit disappointed in the number of titles available for Amazon Prime members, did I misunderstand the hype there? However, I have found quite a few titles that I plan to watch in the future. Hopefully, there will be a lot more Prime content available in the future.
author: Donahoo "merand"

review: This totally opens the power of your TV.  Of course you can get all of your favorite apps: Netflix, Pandora, Hula, ESPN etc etc but there are so many options available. As a Prime member... you get countless TV, movies, MUSIC. You can elect various music playlists. There are games, photos and a wealth of apps.  Your can mirror with your Ipad, phone, Samsung . Takes about 2 minutes to set up and enjoy. GREAT value!!
